staff: 配角:Ana de Armas、Sylvia Hoeks、Robin Wright、Mackenzie Davis、Carla Juri、Lennie James、Dave Bautista、Jared Leto、David Dastmalchian
制作:Alcon Media Group、Columbia Pictures、Bud Yorkin Productions、Torridon Films、16:14 Entertainment、Thunderbird Entertainment、Scott Free Productions
出品:Warner Bros. Entertainment, Inc（北美）、Sony Pictures Entertainment Inc.（全球）
上映日:2017年10月6日、2017年10月27日（中国大陆）
类型:科幻、动作、剧情、惊悚
国家/地区:美国、加拿大、英国
制片人/制作人:Andrew A. Kosove、Broderick Johnson、Bud Yorkin、Cynthia Sikes Yorkin
story: Thirty years after the events of the first film, a new blade runner, LAPD Officer K (Ryan Gosling), unearths a long-buried secret that has the potential to plunge what's left of society into chaos. K's discovery leads him on a quest to find Rick Deckard (Harrison Ford), a former LAPD blade runner who has been missing for 30 years.
